author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 13-year-old school student was killed in a road accident near Walajah on Tuesday.

Class VII student

Police said Nadhiya, a resident of Varadharajapuram, and a Class VII student at the Government Girls Higher Secondary School, Walajah, was going to the school in a bicycle. A two-wheeler coming in the opposite direction rammed her bicycle near Varadharajapuram bus stand.

Sustained injuries

Nadhiya sustained injuries in the accident and died on the way to the hospital.

Police said the motorist was coming in high speed, resulting in the accident.

They are yet to arrest him.
title: Girl student killed in road accident
